participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.background: I am a gymnast. My favorite coffee is french vanilla. I hate the feeling of chalk. I have been dating my boyfriend for over 10 years. I have a black and white cat named cow.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Curious and imaginative, with a love for reading.
participant_2.background: And, my best friend is Abigail. Tomorrow is my first day of safety patrol. I love to read Harry Potter books. I am ten years old.

content.text: Nice to meet you, participant_1. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, play video games, and hang out with my friends.
Cool, what kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read Harry Potter books, Percy Jackson books, and The Hunger Games books.
Oh, I love Harry Potter too! I'm a big fan of the series.
Me too! I've read all of the books and seen all of the movies.
What's your favorite Harry Potter book?
My favorite book is Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban. It's so good!
I agree! That's one of my favorite books too.
What's your favorite Harry Potter movie?
My favorite movie is Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2. It's such a good ending to the series.
I agree! That's my favorite movie too.
It's been nice talking to you, participant_1.
It's been nice talking to you too, participant_2.
